table.name: jo_duplicatechecksettings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `jo_duplicatechecksettings` ( `id` int(3) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `modulename` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `fieldstomatch` blob, `isenabled` int(1) DEFAULT '1', `crosscheck` int(1) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
